verses.verse: Then <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H1085>Bildad<s%> the <S%H7747>Shuhite<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>,
How <S%H575><s%> <S%H5704>long<s%> wilt thou <S%H4448>speak<s%> these <S%H561>things<s%>? And how long shall the words of thy <S%H6310>mouth<s%> be like a <S%H3524>mighty<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%>?
Doth <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H5791>pervert<s%> <S%H4941>justice<s%>? Or doth the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> <S%H5791>pervert<s%> <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>?
If thy <S%H1121>children<s%> have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against <S%H7971>him<s%>, And he hath delivered them into the hand <S%H3027>of<s%> their <S%H6588>transgression<s%>;
If thou wouldest <S%H7836>seek<s%> <S%H7836>diligently<s%> unto <S%H410>God<s%>, And make thy <S%H2603>supplication<s%> to the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%>;

If thou wert <S%H2134>pure<s%> and <S%H3477>upright<s%>: Surely now he would <S%H5782>awake<s%> for <S%H5116>thee<s%>, And make the habitation of thy <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> <S%H7999>prosperous<s%>.
And though thy <S%H7225>beginning<s%> was <S%H4705>small<s%>, Yet thy latter <S%H319>end<s%> would <S%H3966>greatly<s%> <S%H7685>increase<s%>.
For <S%H7592>inquire<s%>, I pray <S%H7223>thee<s%>, of the former <S%H1755>age<s%>, And <S%H3559>apply<s%> thyself to that which their <S%H1>fathers<s%> have searched <S%H2714>out<s%>:
(For we are but of <S%H8543>yesterday<s%>, and <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3117>nothing<s%>, Because our days upon <S%H776>earth<s%> are a <S%H6738>shadow<s%>);
Shall not they <S%H3384>teach<s%> <S%H559>thee<s%>, and tell <S%H3318>thee<s%>, And utter <S%H4405>words<s%> out of their <S%H3820>heart<s%>?
Can the <S%H1573>rush<s%> grow <S%H1342>up<s%> without <S%H1207>mire<s%>? <S%H7685>Can<s%> the <S%H260>flag<s%> <S%H7685>grow<s%> <S%H1097>without<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%>?
Whilst it is yet in its <S%H3>greenness<s%>, and not cut <S%H6998>down<s%>, It <S%H3001>withereth<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> any other <S%H2682>herb<s%>.
So are the <S%H734>paths<s%> of all that <S%H7911>forget<s%> <S%H410>God<s%>; And the <S%H8615>hope<s%> of the <S%H2611>godless<s%> man shall <S%H6>perish<s%>:
Whose <S%H3689>confidence<s%> shall break in <S%H6990>sunder<s%>, And whose <S%H4009>trust<s%> is a <S%H5908>spider<s%>'s <S%H1004>web<s%>.
He shall <S%H8172>lean<s%> upon his <S%H1004>house<s%>, but it shall not <S%H5975>stand<s%>: He shall <S%H2388>hold<s%> fast <S%H6965>thereby<s%>, but it shall not endure.
He is <S%H7373>green<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H8121>sun<s%>, And his <S%H3127>shoots<s%> go <S%H3318>forth<s%> over his <S%H1593>garden<s%>.
His <S%H8328>roots<s%> are wrapped <S%H5440>about<s%> the <S%H1530>stone<s%> -heap, He <S%H2372>beholdeth<s%> the <S%H1004>place<s%> of <S%H68>stones<s%>.
If he be <S%H1104>destroyed<s%> from his <S%H4725>place<s%>, Then it shall <S%H3584>deny<s%> <S%H7200>him<s%>, saying, I have not seen thee.
Behold <S%H4885><s%>, this is the joy of his <S%H1870>way<s%>; And out of the <S%H6083>earth<s%> shall <S%H312>others<s%> <S%H6779>spring<s%>.
Behold <S%H410><s%>, God will not cast <S%H3988>away<s%> a <S%H8535>perfect<s%> <S%H2388>man<s%>, Neither will he uphold the <S%H7489>evil-doers<s%>.
He will yet <S%H4390>fill<s%> thy <S%H6310>mouth<s%> with <S%H7814>laughter<s%>, And thy <S%H8193>lips<s%> with <S%H8643>shouting<s%>.
They that <S%H8130>hate<s%> thee shall be <S%H3847>clothed<s%> with <S%H1322>shame<s%>; And the <S%H168>tent<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall be no <S%H369>more<s%>.
